price: 3. Isku hallee oo talo saarona Alle,  Alle ku Filan wakiil uu ahaado.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
